document.full_text: the international criminal court prosecutor said on monday he had requested arrest warrants for libya's muammar gaddafi, his son saif al-islam and the country's spy chief on charges of crimes against humanity.
document.title: icc prosecutor seeks arrest warrant for gaddafi
lines_and_colors: the international criminal court prosecutor said on monday he had requested arrest warrants for libya's muammar gaddafi, his son saif al-islam and the country's spy chief on charges of crimes against humanity.
